title: All 32 - Cleveland Browns: Breaking down the pressure on Baker Mayfield in Year 3 with Marc Sessler (Football 6/11)
description:
For our 'All 32' series we've chatted with beat writers, reporters, podcasters and dads. Today, we connect with NFL Media's Marc Sessler, who, sure covers the Browns, but is also a fan. Marc and host Will Brinson discuss what went wrong for Cleveland in 2019 and if they can fix it in 2020 (:45). The guys also break down coaching changes (5:15), Baker Mayfield's development (10:15), the defense (16:45) and overall outlook (19:00).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @MarcSessler
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:title: All 32 - Cleveland Browns: Breaking down the pressure on Baker Mayfield in Year 3 with Marc Sessler (Football 6/11)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: The playoffs have expanded, the Browns are getting less hype, so could this finally be the year they sneak in the postseason? NFL Media's Marc Sessler joins us to analyze his favorite team.
